text:
Hi

Is there any function or something to convert a property value to lower or 
upper case??

I use the REPLACE task and I want to replace a string which value is stored in 
a property. I want to replace all those occurrences of that string in lower or 
upper case.

Thanks
creator: raudibert@terra.es
jan@materne.de
text:
Several ways.

1. Use <script> and the upcase() function in javascript.
See http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=ant-user&m=104486168926737&w=2 for an 
example.

2. Write a properties file (<echo>) and load it (replacing names and values; 
<filterchain> will help you here)

3. Omnipresent answer: write your own task :-)



For my concern BugZilla is more a bug tracking system and not a webboard. These 
kinds of question should be asked on user@ant.apache.org.
